DataElement.preferredName: Person Breast Feeding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator response indicating whether a person meets the eligibility criteria with regards to breast feeding.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Breast Feeding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person breast feeding, the nursing of an infant at the mother's breast, as the medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Breast Feeding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient agree to discont
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding while on the trial and for 30 days following last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding while on the trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is actively breastfeeding, does she agree to discontinue breastfeeding before the initiation of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is actively breastfeeding, does she agree to discontinue breastfeeding during treatment with atezolizumab and eribulin and for 2 weeks after last dose?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does female patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding during treatment with olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding while on study and for 1 month after last dose of copanlisib or nivolumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding while on the trial and for 6 months following last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding while on MLN9708 and for 90 days following last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is breastfeeding, does she agree to stop breastfeeding while on MLN9708 (ixazomib citrate) and until 90 days have passed since the last dose?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is breastfeeding, will it be discontinued throughout the treatment period and for at least 28 days following the last dose of study treatment if the mother is treated with entinostat or ZEN003694?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to discontinue breastfeeding while on selinexor or for 90 days after the last dose of Selinexor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breast feeding while taking CBX-12 and for 4 months after cessation of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breast feeding during treatment and for one month after receiving the last dose of therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is breastfeeding, will it be discontinued during treatment with M1774 or avelumab and for at least 1 month after the last dose of study medications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient agree to discontinue breastfeeding during treatment for all drugs and for 2 months after last dose of bortezomib and 1 week after the last dose of Selinexor?
